testCases.label: Dog has make_sound method
testCases.description: Verifies that the Dog class implements a make_sound method.

testCases.label: Cat has make_sound method
testCases.description: Verifies that the Cat class implements a make_sound method.

testCases.label: Duck has make_sound method
testCases.description: Verifies that the Duck class implements a make_sound method.

testCases.label: Dog make_sound output
testCases.description: Checks that Dog.make_sound() returns 'Woof!' for a Dog instance.

testCases.label: Cat make_sound output
testCases.description: Checks that Cat.make_sound() returns 'Meow!' for a Cat instance.

testCases.label: Duck make_sound output
testCases.description: Checks that Duck.make_sound() returns 'Quack!' for a Duck instance.
